name: Phone Ping Pong Lite
description:
Classic PONG like arcade game for the iOS platform platform:

Play:
- Squash / Tennis / Soccer
- 1 Player / 2 Player mode
- 3 Difficulty modes

Purchase the premium version without ads and also running on Apple Watch and AppTV:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/watch-ping-pong/id1039082864?ls=1&mt=8
